org.phantomapi.gui

Interface Element

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PhantomElement

    public interface Element
    A GUI Element. It represents an itemstack with changable information in an item within a window
    Author:
    cyberpwn

    • Method Summary

        c - the click type
        w - the window this element resides in
